title: Troutman Pepper's Market-Leading Multifamily Housing Finance Practice Adds Distinguished Partner in DC - PR Newswire
content: Troutman Pepper's Market-Leading Multifamily Housing Finance Practice Adds Distinguished Partner in DC  PR Newswire
description: /PRNewswire/ -- Dameon Rivers, a top attorney in the housing finance space, has joined Troutman Pepper's industry-leading Multifamily Housing Finance Practice...
